name: Safe & Sound
description:
Safe & Sound, is my first game, that I made in Godot and Aseprite, where you play as a child protecting his cozy home from his nightmares, but it turns out he is dreaming in front of his fire place.

I wish I could have figured out a navigation system and character states for the enemy (I had a nav system but hit and hurt boxers stopped working), and I wish that I could have added a projectile, but I knew I didn't have enough time to implement it and debug it before submission.

p.s. Please give me feedback on what I could do better.
